name: Blocks Adventure (BackToShade)
description:
Hey guys, you want a cute low poly RPG game? Introducing you Blocks Adventure. Exploration, play mini games in an open world game, cast spells and wave your sword to kill monsters, you name it. Please download and have fun with it, I provide you the windows version and the mac version.

This game is created by Yiran Li, a beginner of game design, feel free to leave a comment or E-mail me at franklee31095@gmail.com

Thanks Youtuber Jayanam for your tutorials and assets, those helped me so much!!!

And thank you, viewers!!!
